about_the_game:
Welcome to the Goon-pocalypse! In GOONCRUSHER, survival isn't just a goal—it's a way of life. Brace yourself for heart-pounding action as you embark on a quest to reclaim the wasteland from the clutches of zombie-like goons!

Crush Goons, Win Prizes


In this high-octane survival adventure, your vehicle is your ultimate weapon. Choose from unique vehicles and characters, each with their own playstyle.

Select Your Goon Crusher


The world may have crumbled, but there's still plenty of ground to cover. Traverse eerie green fields, navigate desolate deserts with rocky outcrops, and brave icy terrain as you journey through the post-apocalyptic landscape. Keep your wits about you, because danger lurks around every corner!

Powerup Your Ride


In a world without heroes, only survivors thrive. Will you embrace your inner Goon Crusher and unleash hell on the wasteland, or will you play it safe and focus on survival? Your choices shape your destiny in this unforgiving world, so choose wisely!

Get ready to kick things into overdrive as you immerse yourself in the pulse-pounding atmosphere of GOONCRUSHER. With a soundtrack that amps up the adrenaline and visuals that'll leave you breathless, every moment is a chance to prove your worth in the wasteland.

Gear up, rev your engines, and prepare for the ride of a lifetime in GOONCRUSHER! The fate of humanity hangs in the balance, and only the strongest will survive. Are you ready to take the wheel and crush some goons? The apocalypse awaits!

Join us on Discord!
